queryList.query: MATCH (a {owned: true}) MATCH (b) CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(a, b, '>', 'cost') YIELD path RETURN path
MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b)) WHERE a<>b RETURN p
MATCH p = (a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b) RETURN p

queries.name: Best paths from owned to valuable targets (unlimited)

queryList.query: MATCH (a {owned: true}) MATCH (b {highvalue: true}) CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(a, b, '>', 'cost') YIELD path RETURN path

queries.name: Shortest paths from owned to valuable targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: All paths from owned to valuable targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b {highvalue: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:Contains|AZContains*1..]->({highvalue: true}) WHERE (a:Domain OR a:AZTenant) RETURN p UNION MATCH (p {highvalue: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:Contains|AZContains*1..]->({owned: true}) WHERE (a:Domain OR a:AZTenant) RETURN p UNION MATCH (p {owned: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (c:Computer {enabled: true})-[:HasSession]->(u:User) WHERE coalesce(c.tier, 2)<coalesce(u.tier, 2) RETURN p
MATCH p = (c:Computer {enabled: true})-[:HasSession]->(u:User) WHERE coalesce(c.tier, 2)>coalesce(u.tier, 2) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(:User {highvalue: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Computer {tier: 0})-[:HasSession]->(:User) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(:User {highvalue: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Computer {highvalue: true})-[:HasSession]->(:User) RETURN p
MATCH p = (c:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(u:User) WHERE c.operatingsystem=~'(?i)Windows.*?(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*?' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:User {hasspn: true})<-[:HasSession]-(:Computer) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' RETURN p

queries.name: Potential admins by admincount attribute (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(g:Group) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NOT o.highvalue AND NOT g.highvalue AND o.admincount RETURN p
MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(g:Group) WHERE (NOT u.highvalue AND toUpper(u.name) CONTAINS 'ADM') OR (NOT g.highvalue AND toUpper(g.name) CONTAINS 'ADM') RETURN p
MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})) WHERE o<>t RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned to ADCS (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((o {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})) WHERE o<>t RETURN p UNION MATCH p = shortestPath((o {owned: true})-[r*1..10]->(a:CA)) WHERE o<>a AND none(rel IN r WHERE rel:EnabledBy OR rel:Read) RETURN p

MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CA)) WHERE o<>t AND none(e IN r WHERE e:Enroll OR e:Read OR e:EnabledBy) AND coalesce(o.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p UNION MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate)) WHERE o<>t AND coalesce(o.tier, 2)<>0 AND none(e IN r WHERE e:Enroll OR e:AutoEnroll) AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC1 templates excluding T0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Client Authentication`: true, `Enrollee Supplies Subject`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA) WHERE coalesce(o.tier, 2)<>0 AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC2 templates excluding T0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Any Purpose`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA) WHERE coalesce(o.tier, 2)<>0 AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC3 templates excluding T0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Enrollment Agent`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA) WHERE coalesce(o.tier, 2)<>0 AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC4 templates excluding T0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA) WHERE coalesce(o.tier, 2)<>0 AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NOT (r:EnabledBy OR r:Read OR r:ManageCa OR r:ManageCertificates OR r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p
MATCH (a:CA {`User Specified SAN`: 'Enabled'}) RETURN a

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC7 certificate authorities

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(a:CA) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NOT (r:EnabledBy OR r:Read OR r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p
MATCH (a:CA {`Web Enrollment`: 'Enabled'}) RETURN a

MATCH p = (o)-[:Enroll]->(:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true,`Client Authentication`:true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA {`Web Enrollment`:'Enabled'}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Client Authentication`: true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA) WHERE 'NoSecurityExtension' IN t.`Enrollment Flag` AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NOT (r:EnabledBy OR r:Read OR r:ManageCa OR r:ManageCertificates) RETURN p
MATCH (a:CA {`Enforce Encryption for Requests`: 'Disabled', `Request Disposition`: 'Issue'}) RETURN a

MATCH p = (o)-[:Enroll]->(:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true,`Client Authentication`: true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA {`Enforce Encryption for Requests`: 'Disabled', `Request Disposition`: 'Issue'}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from standard groups to valueable targets (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (g:Group)-[r*1..3]->({highvalue: true}) WHERE any(s IN ['-S-1-1-0', '-S-1-5-11', '-513', '-515'] WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH s) RETURN p
MATCH p = (g:Group)-[r*1..3]->() WHERE any(s IN ['-S-1-1-0', '-S-1-5-11', '-513', '-515'] WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH s) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from regular users to valueable targets (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[*1..3]->({highvalue: true}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users with local admin rights (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..3]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users with local execution rights (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:AdminTo|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|WriteAccountRestrictions|MemberOf*1..3]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users with LAPS access (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:AdminTo|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|WriteAccountRestrictions|MemberOf*1..3]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users with gMSA access (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:ReadGMSAPassword|MemberOf*1..3]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users with DCSync rights (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:DCSync|AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|MemberOf*1..3]->(:Domain) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users that can reset passwords (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:ForceChangePassword|MemberOf*1..3]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users that can add members to groups (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:AddMember|MemberOf*1..3]->(:Group) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users with paths to disabled users (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteAccountRestrictions|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|WriteProperty|MemberOf*1..3]->(:User {enabled: false}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Regular users with paths to disabled computers (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteAccountRestrictions|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|WriteProperty|MemberOf*1..3]->(:Computer {enabled: false}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p
MATCH p = (o)-[:Owns]->() WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (coalesce(o.tier, 3)>=2 OR NOT o.highvalue) RETURN p

queries.name: Objects with potential password in description

queryList.query: MATCH (x) WHERE any(y IN ['passw', 'pw:', 'pw=', 'pw =', 'kennw', 'kw:', 'kw=', 'kw ='] WHERE toLower(x.description) CONTAINS y) RETURN x
MATCH (c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE coalesce(c.lastlogon, 0) <= 0 AND coalesce(c.lastlogontimestamp, 0) <= 0 RETURN c
MATCH p = (x {enabled: true})-[r]->(y) WHERE coalesce(x.tier, 2)<>0 AND y.tier=0 AND NOT r:SharesPasswordWith AND NOT r:HasSession RETURN p

MATCH p = ()-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(x:Group) WHERE any(y IN ['EXCHANGE TRUSTED SUBSYSTEM', 'EXCHANGE WINDOWS PERMISSIONS', 'ORGANIZATION MANAGEMENT', 'SECURITY ADMINISTRATOR'] WHERE x.name STARTS WITH y + '@') RETURN p UNION MATCH (o:OU)-[:Contains]->(g:Group) WHERE o.name STARTS WITH 'MICROSOFT EXCHANGE SECURITY GROUPS@' MATCH p = ()-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(g) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Computer {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(:Group {highvalue: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Computers with local admin rights (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Computer {enabled: true})-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:Computer {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:Computer {enabled: true, smbsigning: false}) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from computers excluding T0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:Computer {enabled: true})-[r*1..2]->(b) WHERE a<>b AND NOT b:Group AND none(e IN r WHERE e:Contains OR e:HasSession OR e:Enroll OR e:AutoEnroll) AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a {enabled: true, unconstraineddelegation: true}) WHERE coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(b) WHERE coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p

queries.name: Constrained delegations with protocol transition excluding T0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT a.allowedtodelegate IS NULL AND a.trustedtoauth=true AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p

queries.name: Constrained delegations without protocol transition excluding T0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT a.allowedtodelegate IS NULL AND a.trustedtoauth=false AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:AllowedToAct|AddAllowedToAct]->(b) WHERE coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p

queries.name: T0 users that can be delegated

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, sensitive: false, tier: 0}) RETURN p

queries.name: Valueable users that can be delegated

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, sensitive: false, highvalue: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Linux servers potentially vulnerable to account name spoofing

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT toUpper(c.operatingsystem) STARTS WITH 'WINDOWS' AND NOT c.operatingsystem STARTS WITH 'Mac OS X' AND c.operatingsystem<>'macOS' AND NOT c.operatingsystem STARTS WITH 'NetApp' AND c.operatingsystem<>'OnTap' AND c.operatingsystem<>'Cisco Identity Services Engine' RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[]->(:GPO)-[:GPLink]->(b) WHERE (((a:User OR a:Computer) AND a.enabled) OR a:Group) AND (b:OU OR b:Domain) AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 AND b.tier=0 RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to GPOs excluding T0

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[]->(b:GPO)) WHERE a<>b AND (((a:User OR a:Computer) AND a.enabled) OR a:Group) AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..10]->(o:OU) MATCH (o)-[:Contains*1..10]->(:User) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..10]->(o:OU) MATCH (o)-[:Contains*1..10]->(:Computer) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..5]->(:OU) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:GPO)-[:GPLink]->(a) WHERE a:OU OR a:Domain RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c {enabled: true}) WHERE (c:User OR c:Computer) AND any(x IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE x STARTS WITH 'MSSQLSvc/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSServerCluster/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSClusterVirtualServer/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSServerClusterMgmtAPI/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true})<-[:SQLAdmin]-(o) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p
MATCH p = (o)-[:SQLAdmin]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Users that are member of a foreign group (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE u.domain<>g.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Users with same name in different domain

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User), (u2:User) WHERE split(u1.name,'@')[0]=split(u2.name,'@')[0] AND u1.domain<>u2.domain AND toInteger(split(u1.objectid,'-')[7])>=1000 RETURN u1
MATCH p = (a)-[:Owns]->(b) WHERE a.domainsid<>b.domainsid RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[r]->(b) WHERE a.domainsid<>b.domainsid AND r.isacl RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[]->(b) WHERE a.domainsid<>b.domainsid RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from objects in owned domains to other domains

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain {owned: true})-[:Contains*1..]->(a)-[]->(b)<-[Contains*1..]-(:Domain {owned: false}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (u1:User)-[:HasCredential]->(:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(u2:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u1.domain<>u2.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned domains via password reuse

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain {owned: true})-[:Contains*1..]->(:User)-[:HasCredential]->(:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(:User {enabled: true})<-[:Contains*1..]-(:Domain {owned: false}) RETURN p

MATCH (c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE (c.lastlogon > 0 AND datetime().epochseconds - c.lastlogon < 60*60*24*90) OR (c.lastlogontimestamp > 0 AND datetime().epochseconds - c.lastlogontimestamp < 60*60*24*90) SET c.active=true

MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE (u.lastlogon > 0 AND datetime().epochseconds - u.lastlogon < 60*60*24*90) OR (u.lastlogontimestamp > 0 AND datetime().epochseconds - u.lastlogontimestamp < 60*60*24*90) SET u.active=true
MATCH (a) WHERE NOT a.allowedtodelegate IS NULL MATCH (b) WHERE a<>b AND any(s IN b.serviceprincipalnames WHERE s IN a.allowedtodelegate) MERGE p = (a)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(b) RETURN p

queries.name: Connect service accounts to computers where they might be running

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn: true}) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE any(s IN u.serviceprincipalnames WHERE c.name=toUpper(split(s, '/')[1]) OR c.name=toUpper(split(s, '/')[1] + '.' + u.domain)) MERGE p = (c)-[:MaybeHasService]->(u) RETURN p
MATCH (c:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(u:User) MERGE (u)-[:HasSession]->(c)
MATCH (d:Domain) SET d.tier=0, d.highvalue=true RETURN d

MATCH (x:Group) WHERE any(y IN [512, 516, 517, 518, 519, 526, 527] WHERE x.objectid ENDS WITH '-' + toString(y)) OR any(y IN ['S-1-5-32-544', 'S-1-5-32-548', 'S-1-5-32-549', 'S-1-5-32-550', 'S-1-5-32-551', 'S-1-5-9'] WHERE x.objectid ENDS WITH '-' + y) SET x.tier=0, x.highvalue=true RETURN x

MATCH (x:Group) WHERE any(y IN ['DNSADMINS', 'DHCP ADMINISTRATORS', 'ORGANIZATION MANAGEMENT', 'EXCHANGE TRUSTED SUBSYSTEM', 'EXCHANGE WINDOWS PERMISSIONS'] WHERE x.name STARTS WITH y + '@') OR any(y IN ['S-1-5-32-562', 'S-1-5-32-573', 'S-1-5-32-555', 'S-1-5-32-580'] WHERE x.objectid ENDS WITH '-' + y) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN x

queries.name: Tag members of T0 groups (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(y:Group {tier: 0}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.tier=0, x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Tag members of valueable groups (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(y:Group {highvalue: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (x:OU)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {tier: 0}) WHERE (y:OU OR y:Group OR y:User OR y:Computer) SET x.tier=0, x.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_' SET u.tier=0, u.highvalue=true RETURN u

queries.name: Mark objects with direct paths to T0 as valuable

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[]->(b {tier: 0}) WHERE coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 SET a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark active computers without LAPS as valuable

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c) AS x MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {active: true, haslaps: false}) WHERE tolower(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'windows' AND NOT c IN x AND NOT any(spn IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(spn) STARTS WITH 'msclustervirtualserver/') SET c.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark computers with sessions of valuable users

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y:User) WHERE (y.tier=0 OR y.highvalue) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' SET u.sensitive=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->({tier: 0}) RETURN p UNION MATCH (p {tier: 0}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (x)-[]->(y) WHERE x.tier > y.tier OR (x.tier IS NULL AND y.tier < 2) RETURN p

queries.name: Users and computers violating T0 (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[*1..5]->(y:Domain)) WHERE x<>y AND (x:User OR x:Computer) AND coalesce(x.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(o) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND any(x IN ['vmware', 'vcenter', 'vsphere', 'veeam', 'arcserve', 'commvault', 'backup', 'back', 'bak', 'bck', 'adm', 'admin', 'support', 'helpdesk', 'it', 'join', 'setup', 'inst', 'deploy', 'pki', 'ca', 'sccm'] WHERE toLower(o.samaccountname) CONTAINS x OR toLower(o.description) CONTAINS x) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a:OU)-[:Contains*1..]->(b) WHERE a.name=~'(?i)t(ier)?.?2.*?' SET a.tier=2, b.tier=2 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a:OU)-[:Contains*1..]->(b) WHERE a.name=~'(?i)t(ier)?.?1.*?' SET a.tier=1, b.tier=1 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a:OU)-[:Contains*1..]->(b) WHERE a.name=~'(?i)t(ier)?.?0.*?' SET a.tier=0, b.tier=0 RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(o:OU) MATCH (o)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE o.tier IS NULL AND toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'WINDOWS' AND NOT toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'SERVER' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(o:OU) MATCH (o)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE o.tier IS NULL AND toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'WINDOWS SERVER' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(o:OU) MATCH (o)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE o.tier IS NULL RETURN p
MATCH (a) SET a.tier=null, a.highvalue=null

queries.name: T0 users that never set a password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier: 0}) WHERE u.pwdlastset <= 0 RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users that never set a password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.pwdlastset <= 0 RETURN p

queries.name: T0 users without password change since a year

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier: 0}) WHERE u.pwdlastset <= 0 OR datetime().epochseconds - u.pwdlastset > 60*60*24*365 RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users without password change since a year

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.pwdlastset <= 0 OR datetime().epochseconds - u.pwdlastset > 60*60*24*365 RETURN p

queries.name: T0 users with password change after last logon

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier: 0}) WHERE u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogon AND u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogontimestamp RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with password change after last logon

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogon AND u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogontimestamp RETURN p

queries.name: T0 users with password not required

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, tier: 0, passwordnotreqd: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with password not required

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, passwordnotreqd: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: T0 users with never expiring passwords

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, tier: 0, pwdneverexpires: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with never expiring passwords

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, pwdneverexpires: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled members of dangerous groups (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE g.name=~'(?i)(ACCOUNT OPERATORS|SERVER OPERATORS|PRINT OPERATORS|SCHEMA ADMINS|DNSADMINS)@.*?' RETURN p
MATCH p = (o)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'PRE-WINDOWS 2000 COMPATIBLE ACCESS@' RETURN p

queries.name: T0 users that are not protected (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH (u:User {enabled: true, tier: 0}) WHERE NOT u IN x RETURN u
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {active: true}) WHERE c.operatingsystem =~ '(?i)Windows.*?(2000|2003|2008|me|xp|vista|7|8).*?' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {active: true}) WHERE c.operatingsystem =~ '(?i)Windows.*?(2000|2003|2008|2012|me|xp|vista|7|8).*?' RETURN p

queries.name: Active computers without LAPS excluding DCs (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c) AS x MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {active: true, haslaps: false}) WHERE NOT c IN x AND toUpper(c.operatingsystem) STARTS WITH 'WINDOWS' RETURN p

queries.name: Active computers without password change since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {active: true}) WHERE c.pwdlastset <= 0 OR datetime().epochseconds - c.pwdlastset > 60*60*24*90 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier: 0}) WHERE coalesce(u.lastlogon, 0) <= 0 AND coalesce(u.lastlogontimestamp, 0) <= 0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE coalesce(u.lastlogon, 0) <= 0 AND coalesce(u.lastlogontimestamp, 0) <= 0 RETURN p

queries.name: T0 users without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier: 0}) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.active, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.active, false) AND (coalesce(u.lastlogon, 0) > 0 OR coalesce(u.lastlogontimestamp, 0) > 0) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: false}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true, tier: 0}) WHERE coalesce(c.lastlogon, 0) <= 0 AND coalesce(c.lastlogontimestamp, 0) <= 0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE coalesce(c.lastlogon) <= 0 AND coalesce(c.lastlogontimestamp) <= 0 RETURN p

queries.name: T0 computers without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true, tier: 0}) WHERE NOT coalesce(c.active, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled computers without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(c.active, false) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: false}) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from cracked passwords excluding T0 to valueable targets (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Credential {cracked: true})-[:AssignedTo]->(u:User {enabled: true})-[*1..3]->({highvalue: true}) WHERE coalesce(u.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Credential {cracked: true})-[:AssignedTo]->(u:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Credential {cracked: true})-[:AssignedTo]->(u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE u.tier=0 OR g.tier=0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Credential {cracked: true})-[:AssignedTo]->(u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE u.highvalue OR g.highvalue RETURN p
MATCH p = (a:User {enabled: true})-[:HasCredential]-(:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(b: User {enabled: true}) WHERE a<>b AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 AND coalesce(b.tier, 2)=0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (a:User {enabled: true})-[:HasCredential]-(:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(b: User {enabled: true}) WHERE a<>b AND NOT coalesce(a.highvalue, false) AND b.highvalue RETURN p

queries.name: Users with shared passwords excluding empty password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c:Credential)-[r:AssignedTo*1..3]-(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE c.nthash<>'31d6cfe0d16ae931b73c59d7e0c089c0' AND size(r) > 1 RETURN p

queries.name: Users where password equals username or reverse username

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toLower(c.password)=toLower(u.samaccountname) OR toLower(c.password)=toLower(reverse(u.samaccountname)) SET c.weak=true RETURN p

queries.name: Users where password contains username or reverse username

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toLower(c.password) CONTAINS toLower(u.samaccountname) OR toLower(c.password) CONTAINS toLower(reverse(u.samaccountname)) SET c.weak=true RETURN p

queries.name: Users where password contains part of domain

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE any(part IN split(u.domain, '.')[0..-1] WHERE toLower(c.password) CONTAINS toLower(part)) RETURN p
MATCH p = (c:Credential {nthash: '31d6cfe0d16ae931b73c59d7e0c089c0'})-[:AssignedTo]->(:User {enabled: true}) SET c.weak=true RETURN p

queries.name: Users with passwords up to 4 chars

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE size(c.password) <= 4 SET c.weak=true RETURN p

queries.name: Users with passwords up to 8 chars

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE size(c.password) <= 8 SET c.weak=true RETURN p

MATCH p = (c:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE c.password IS NOT NULL AND size(c.password) > 0 AND toLower(c.password)<>toLower(u.samaccountname) AND toLower(u.description) CONTAINS toLower(c.password) RETURN p
MATCH p = (a:Credential)-[:AssignedTo]->(b:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE a.password=toLower(left(replace(b.samaccountname, '$', ''), 14)) SET a.weak=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'acronisagent/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'boostfs/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'veeamagentwindows/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'veeamenterprisemanagersvc/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE s =~ '^(?i)Veeam(AgentWindows|CatalogSvc|DeploySvc|DistributionSvc|EnterpriseManagerSvc|FilesysVssSvc|GuestHelperSvc|LogShipperSvc|MountSvc|NfsSvc|TapeSvc|TransportSvc)/.*?') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'dfsr-') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'ftp/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'nfs/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'iscsitarget/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'hdfs/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'dns/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'gc/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'ldap/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'http/' OR tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'https/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'hyper-v replica service/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE s =~ '^(?i)exchange(ab|rfr|mdb)/.*?') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'imap/' OR tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'imap4/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'pop/' OR tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'pop3/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'smtp/' OR tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'smtpsvc/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'afpserver/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'directauthorize/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'cmrcservice/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'vnc/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'termsrv/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE any(s IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE tolower(s) STARTS WITH 'wsman/') SET c.wellknownspn=true RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(o {enabled: true}) WHERE (o:User OR o:Computer) AND NOT coalesce(o.wellknownspn, false) AND any(s IN o.serviceprincipalnames WHERE NOT s =~ '^(?i)(cifs|host|microsoft virtual console service|microsoft virtual system migration service|restrictedkrbhost|rpc|tapinego)/.*?') RETURN p
MATCH (o) WHERE (o.name IS NULL OR o.name='placeholder') AND o.displayname IS NOT NULL SET o.name=o.displayname RETURN o
MATCH (t:AZTenant) SET t.tier=0, t.highvalue=true RETURN t

MATCH (r:AZRole) WHERE r.displayname =~ '(?i)Application Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Directory Synchronization Accounts|Domain Name Administrator|External Identity Provider Administrator|Global Administrator|Hybrid Identity Administrator|Intune Administrator|Partner Tier1 Support|Partner Tier2 Support|Privileged Authentication Administrator|Privileged Role Administrator|Security Administrator|User Administrator' SET r.tier=0, r.highvalue=true RETURN r

MATCH (r:AZRole) WHERE r.displayname =~ '(?i)Application Developer|Attribute Assignment Administrator|Attribute Assignment Reader|Attribute Definition Administrator|Attribute Definition Reader|Attribute Log Administrator|Authentication Administrator|Authentication Extensibility Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Azure DevOps Administrator|B2C IEF Keyset Administrator|B2C IEF Policy Administrator|Billing Administrator|Cloud App Security Administrator|Cloud Device Administrator|Compliance Data Administrator|Conditional Access Administrator|Device Managers|Directory Writers|Exchange Administrator|Extended Directory User Administrator|External ID User Flow Administrator|External ID User Flow Attribute Administrator|Global Reader|Global Secure Access Administrator|Groups Administrator|Helpdesk Administrator|Identity Governance Administrator|Knowledge Administrator|Knowledge Manager|License Administrator|Lifecycle Workflows Administrator|Microsoft Entra Joined Device Local Administrator|Organizational Branding Administrator|Partner Tier1 Support|Password Administrator|Permissions Management Administrator|Security Operator|Security Reader|SharePoint Administrator|Teams Administrator|Windows 365 Administrator|Windows Update Deployment Administrator|Yammer Administrator' SET r.highvalue=true RETURN r

queries.name: Mark users with T0 roles (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..10]->(r:AZRole) WHERE r.tier=0 SET u.tier=0, u.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark users with valueable roles (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..10]->(r:AZRole) WHERE r.highvalue SET u.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark owners of subscriptions as T0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[:AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator]->(s:AZSubscription) SET n.tier=0, n.highvalue=true, s.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark service principals with privileged MS Graph app role assignments

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:AZServicePrincipal)-[:AZMGAdministrativeUnit_ReadWrite_All|AZMGAppRoleAssignment_ReadWrite_All|AZMGApplication_ReadWrite_All|AZMGApplication_ReadWrite_OwnedBy|AZMGDirectory_ReadWrite_All|AZMGDomain_ReadWrite_All|AZMGEntitlementManagement_ReadWrite_All|AZMGGroupMember_ReadWrite_All|AZMGGroup_ReadWrite_All|AZMGOrganization_ReadWrite_All|AZMGPolicy_ReadWrite_AuthenticationMethod|AZMGPolicy_ReadWrite_PermissionGrant|AZMGPrivilegedAccess_ReadWrite_AzureADGroup|AZMGPrivilegedAssignmentSchedule_ReadWrite_AzureADGroup|AZMGPrivilegedEligibilitySchedule_ReadWrite_AzureADGroup|AZMGRoleAssignmentSchedule_ReadWrite_Directory|AZMGRoleEligibilitySchedule_ReadWrite_Directory|AZMGRoleManagementPolicy_ReadWrite_AzureADGroup|AZMGRoleManagementPolicy_ReadWrite_Directory|AZMGRoleManagement_ReadWrite_Directory|AZMGServicePrincipalEndpoint_ReadWrite_All|AZMGUserAuthenticationMethod_ReadWrite_All|AZMGUser_ManageIdentities_All|AZMGUser_ReadWrite_All]->(b:AZServicePrincipal) WHERE b.name STARTS WITH 'MICROSOFT GRAPH@' SET a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark apps that are running as T0 service principal

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:AZApp)-[:AZRunsAs]->(:AZServicePrincipal {tier: 0}) SET a.tier=0, a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark apps that are running as valueable service principal

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:AZApp)-[:AZRunsAs]->(:AZServicePrincipal {highvalue: true}) SET a.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZApp {tier: 0}) SET a.tier=0, a.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZApp {highvalue: true}) SET a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark owners of any application as valueable

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZApp) SET n.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark objects with direct control over the tenant as valueable (e.g. AZMGGrantAppRoles)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[]->(:AZTenant) SET a.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:AZTenant)-[:AZContains*1..]->({tier: 0}) RETURN p UNION MATCH (p {tier: 0}) RETURN p

queries.name: Principals without Azure role but with RBAC role User Access Administrator (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (u) WHERE NOT EXISTS((u)-[:AZMemberOf|AZHasRole*1..10]->(:AZRole)) AND EXISTS((u)-[:AZUserAccessAdministrator]->()) RETURN u
MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[r*1..10]->(b {tier: 0})) WHERE a<>b AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p
MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[r*1..10]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE a<>b AND (NOT a.highvalue OR a.highvalue IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to high value roles (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((m)-[*1..10]->(n:AZRole)) WHERE n.displayname =~ '(?i)Global Administrator|User Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Exchange Administrator|Helpdesk Administrator|Privileged Authentication Administrator' AND NOT m = n RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from applications to high value targets (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((m:AZApp)-[r*1..10]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE none(r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChanges') AND none(r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChangesAll') AND NOT m = n RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to VMs excluding T0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[*1..3]->(b:AZVM)) WHERE a<>b AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to key vaults excluding T0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[*1..3]->(b:AZKeyVault)) WHERE a<>b AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to ressource groups excluding T0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[*1..3]->(b:AZResourceGroup)) WHERE a<>b AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to subscriptions excluding T0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[*1..3]->(b:AZSubscription)) WHERE a<>b AND coalesce(a.tier, 2)<>0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (n)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZGroup) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from principals without an Azure role but the RBAC role User Access Administrator to resources (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u)-[:AZUserAccessAdministrator]->(t) WHERE NOT EXISTS((u)-[:AZMemberOf|AZHasRole*1..10]->(:AZRole)) RETURN u, p

queries.name: Paths from guests to valueable objects (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a:AZUser {enabled: true, usertype:'Guest'})-[*1..3]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: Service principals with MS Graph app role assignments

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:AZServicePrincipal {enabled: true})-[]->(:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: 'Microsoft Graph'}) RETURN p
MATCH p = ()-[:AZAddOwner|AZAddSecret|AZAppAdmin|AZCloudAppAdmin|AZMGAddOwner|AZMGAddSecret|AZOwns]->(:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: 'Microsoft Graph'}) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path to MS Graph (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((n)-[*1..10]->(g:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: 'Microsoft Graph'})) WHERE n<>g RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path from users to service principals (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((:AZUser {enabled: true})-[*1..10]->(:AZServicePrincipal {enabled: true})) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path from users to managed identities (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((:AZUser {enabled: true})-[*1..10]->(:AZServicePrincipal {enabled: true, serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'})) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:AZTenant)-[:AZContains*1..]->(:AZServicePrincipal {enabled: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:AZTenant)-[:AZContains*1..]->(:AZServicePrincipal {enabled: true, serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) RETURN p

queries.name: Users in valueable roles synced from on-prem (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:AZUser {enabled: true, onpremsyncenabled: true})-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..10]->(r:AZRole {highvalue: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from users synced from on-prem to high value targets (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((u:AZUser {enabled: true, onpremsyncenabled: true})-[*1..10]->(n {highvalue: true})) WHERE u<>n RETURN p
MATCH p = (:AZTenant)-[:AZContains*1..]->(u:AZUser {enabled: true, onpremsyncenabled: true, usertype: 'Guest'}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:AZTenant)-[:AZContains*1..]->(u:AZUser {enabled: true, onpremsyncenabled: true, usertype: 'Member'}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:AZTenant)-[:AZContains*1..]->(g:AZGroup {onpremsyncenabled: true}) RETURN p
MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toUpper(u.name) STARTS WITH 'MSOL_' RETURN u UNION MATCH (u:AZUser {enabled: true}) WHERE toUpper(u.userprincipalname) STARTS WITH 'SYNC_' RETURN u
